full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
=====================================

### Tender Details

*   **Tender Identification Number:** WS4220382607-Doc4318900769
*   **Tender Title:** Radio Frequency Shielded Racks
*   **Publication Date:** November 21, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** December 11, 2023, 14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date:** December 8, 2023

### Tender Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) on November 21, 2023, for Radio Frequency Shielded Racks. The goods procurement method is competitive open bidding, and the lowest price will be the criteria for award.

### Procurement Details

*   **UNSPSC Code:** 56111906 - Industrial cabinets or drawers or shelving
*   **Delivery Region:** British Columbia
*   **End User:** Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)
*   **End User Address:** 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E4, Canada
*   **Contract Award Method:** Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contract Award and Delivery

The expected contract start date is nil, and the expected end date is March 31, 2025.

### Contact Information

*   **Contracting Authority:** Wong, Katie (SPAC/PSPC) (elle-la / she-her)
*   **Email:** [katie.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:katie.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   **Notice URL:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18069879?extsite=MTgwNjk4NzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18069879?extsite=MTgwNjk4NzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Contract Award Criteria and Procurement Process

A competitive bidding process will be used to procure goods in accordance with the PSPC tendering procedures, and the Contract Award Method is lowest price.

The bid should meet the minimum requirements of the procurement documentation. All bids must be received on or before the tender closing date, December 11, 2023
